about_the_game:
Crazy Cook is a fun and crazy musical cooking game for the whole family ! Your goal is to create great recipes…with a twist : the ingredients are a bit hostile !
You will have to cut, shoot, smash them. It is a very good exercice if you want to get fit !

Are you ready to peel smiling oignons with a peeler ? (workshop 1)
To slice flying pigs with a huge knife and block bad ingredients ? (workshop 2)
Smash crazy tomatoes with a hammer ? (workshop 3)
Shoot jumping chickens with a salt mill ? (workshop 4)

10 recipes, 10 songs with 4 workshops each are included : that's 40 ways to have crazy fun !

Crazy Cook is in early acces. It's only the beginning !
We will soon add 2 new recipes (Dim Sum and sushi), 2 workshops (Pistol shooting and baking).
We'll also add new features, new songs, new recipes and new tools ! Stay tuned.

Thank you for purchasing the game in early acces. It means the world !
